mapper.sql: id, HRV AS hrv, sbp_ave AS sbpAve, dbp_ave AS dbpAve, Heartrate, Bloodoxygen, microcirculation, Amedicalreport, respirationrate, phone, imei, createtime
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT tc.name,tx.* FROM( SELECT HRV,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,Heartrate,Bloodoxygen,microcirculation,respirationrate,substring(tp.phone,9) as phone,tt.createtime FROM jfhealth tp RIGHT JOIN( SELECT MAX(createtime) as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') GROUP BY phone ) tt ON tp.createtime=tt.createtime )tx LEFT JOIN user tc ON tx.phone=tc.id ) tb

SELECT '置顶' as id,tc.name,tx.HRV,tx.sbp_ave,tx.dbp_ave,tx.Heartrate,tx.Bloodoxygen,tx.microcirculation,tx.respirationrate,tx.phone,DATE_FORMAT(tx.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime,tc.love FROM( SELECT HRV,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,Heartrate,Bloodoxygen,microcirculation,respirationrate,substring(tp.phone,9) as phone,tt.createtime FROM jfhealth tp RIGHT JOIN( SELECT MAX(createtime) as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') GROUP BY phone ) tt ON tp.createtime=tt.createtime )tx LEFT JOIN user tc ON tx.phone=tc.id WHERE tc.love=1 LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT tg.gender, SUM(IF(tg.Heartrate <= 49,1,0)) as heartrate1, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 50 AND tg.Heartrate <= 59),1,0)) as heartrate2, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 60 AND tg.Heartrate <= 69),1,0)) as heartrate3, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 70 AND tg.Heartrate <= 79),1,0)) as heartrate4, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 80 AND tg.Heartrate <= 89),1,0)) as heartrate5, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 90 AND tg.Heartrate <= 100),1,0)) as heartrate6, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate > 100),1,0)) as heartrate7 FROM ( SELECT td.*,CASE WHEN tc.gender='男' THEN 0 WHEN tc.gender='女' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS gender FROM ( SELECT Heartrate,substring(phone,9) as phone,createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') ) td LEFT JOIN user tc ON td.phone=tc.id ) tg GROUP BY tg.gender

SELECT SUM(IF((sbp_ave<90 AND dbp_ave<60),1,0)) as blood1, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=90 AND sbp_ave<120 AND dbp_ave>=60 AND dbp_ave<80),1,0)) as blood2, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=120 AND sbp_ave<139 AND dbp_ave>=80 AND dbp_ave<89),1,0)) as blood3, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=140 AND sbp_ave<159 AND dbp_ave>=90 AND dbp_ave<99),1,0)) as blood4, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=160 AND sbp_ave<179 AND dbp_ave>=100 AND dbp_ave<109),1,0)) as blood5, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=180 AND dbp_ave>110),1,0)) as blood6 FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

SELECT SUM(IF((microcirculation>=80),1,0)) as microcirculation1, SUM(IF((microcirculation>=70 AND microcirculation<80),1,0)) as microcirculation2, SUM(IF((microcirculation>=50 AND microcirculation<70),1,0)) as microcirculation3 FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

SELECT tg.gender, SUM(IF(tg.Bloodoxygen<94,1,0)) as bloodoxygen1, SUM(IF((tg.Bloodoxygen>=94 AND tg.Bloodoxygen<=99),1,0)) as bloodoxygen2 FROM ( SELECT td.*,CASE WHEN tc.gender='男' THEN 0 WHEN tc.gender='女' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS gender FROM ( SELECT Bloodoxygen,substring(phone,9) as phone,createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m') ) td LEFT JOIN user tc ON td.phone=tc.id ) tg GROUP BY tg.gender

SELECT SUM(IF((respirationrate>=24),1,0)) as respirationrate1, SUM(IF((respirationrate>=12 AND respirationrate<24),1,0)) as respirationrate2, SUM(IF((respirationrate<12),1,0)) as respirationrate3 FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

SELECT imei,substring(phone,9) as phone,Heartrate,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,microcirculation,respirationrate,Bloodoxygen,HRV,Amedicalreport,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime FROM jfhealth LIMIT 0,100
